Customer Problem - Long sales cycles cause life insurers to lose customers. Each interaction increases the chance of customer attrition. Clinical data collection required to complete underwriting of life insurance applications is one of the biggest contributors to this attrition. Business Model - Force Diagnostics charges transactional fees from life insurance carriers for the collection and transmission of policy applicant data. Our ClinicsNow! software is an Internet of Services (IoS) solution which connects thousands of urgent care centers into a single network; enabling our life insurance customers to rapidly access health data and accelerate their sales cycles. Servicing up to 15MM applicants per year ensures long-term value. Customer Segments - We are an insurance underwriting data services company. Annually, there are 15 million applications for individual life insurance policies. Customer segments are represented through agents (captive and independent), direct marketing, and online sales. This industry is highly relationship driven. To acquire customers, we have hired respected industry professionals with established relationships. Competitors - Competitors follow an independent contractor model which provides limited control over the customer experience, unpredictable service availability and lack of flexibility. Barriers to entry include exclusive contracts with our clinic partners and a network-wide, installed-base of our ClinicsNow! software. Competitive Advantage - We leverage a customer-focused healthcare infrastructure to directly address pain points all life insurers are facing today; provided through a sophisticated nationwide network, which generates more accurate and complete clinical data, and reduces attrition caused by delay and negative experiences from the current model.
